articles.description: For many people, rice is a pantry staple. But, if don&#39;t use it very often, should you put your uncooked rice in the freezer to preserve it longer?
articles.content: So, now you know that box of brown rice that's been lingering in your pantry for as long as you can remember probably isn't still going to be the freshest. However, can you truly tell when your rice … [+1073 chars]
